layers.name: False Color
layers.description: Based on the combination of bands NIR narrow, red and green

layers.name: NDVI
layers.description: Normalized difference of bands NIR narrow and red

layers.name: Moisture Index
layers.description: Normalized difference of bands SWIR1 and NIR narrow

layers.name: SWIR
layers.description: Based on the combination of bands SIWR2, NIR narrow and red

layers.name: NDWI
layers.description: Normalized difference of bands green and NIR narrow

layers.name: True Color
layers.description: Based on the combination of bands blue, green and red
